content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I like to take up new hobbies, like skiing, to keep my mind and body active.
That's awesome! I love skiing too. Do you go skiing often?
Not as often as I would like to, but I try to go a few times a year.
Where do you like to ski?
I like to go to the mountains in Colorado.
That's a great place to ski! I've been there a few times and I love it.
It's a beautiful place to ski and the snow is always great.
Do you like any other types of outdoor activities?
I love hiking, camping, and fishing.
Those are all great activities! I love hiking and camping too.
We should go skiing together sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to go skiing with you.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
